errors.error_description: The instructions for installing from source incorrectly state that `pip install .` should be run before cloning or downloading the source code, which is impossible as the command must be run inside the source directory.
correction_candidates: The command should be `pip install git+https://github.com/python-control/python-control.git` instead of `pip install .`.
The user must first download the source, navigate into the directory, and then run `pip install .`.
The user should run `pip download python-control` first, then `pip install .`.
errors.golden_answer: The user must first download the source, navigate into the directory, and then run `pip install .`.
